content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. Based on our discussions, I would like to propose a rental price of 1,000 Euros per month. This takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in Munich. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate on the rental price, is there any room for negotiation?

Also, I would like to know if there is a security deposit required for the apartment.

I would also like to know if there is any additional fees or charges that I need to be aware of.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Of course, I am open to negotiating the rental price. I am willing to consider a lower price if that is what works best for you. As for the security deposit, I do require one equal to six months' worth of rent. This is standard practice in the rental market in Munich. Additionally, there may be some fees associated with the move-in process, such as a cleaning fee or a key deposit, but I will provide you with a detailed list of all fees and charges before signing the lease agreement. Is there anything else you would like to discuss?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to know if there is a parking space included in the rental price, and if not, how much would it cost me per month?

Also, I would like to know if there are any restrictions on pets in the apartment building.

Finally, I would like to know if there is any possibility of renewing the lease agreement after the initial term of 12 months.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

I would like to agree to the rental price of 1,000 Euros per month.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your responses, Bo. I am glad to hear that you have agreed to the rental price of 1,000 Euros per month. Regarding your questions:

Unfortunately, there is no parking space included in the rental price. However, there are several parking options available in the area, including street parking and public parking lots. The cost of parking varies depending on the location and duration of use. I can provide you with more information on parking options and costs upon request.

There are no restrictions on pets in the apartment building. However, I do require that any pets be well-behaved and not cause any damage to the property.

Yes, it is possible to renew the lease agreement after the initial term of 12 months, as long as both parties agree to the terms and conditions. I will include a renewal option in the lease agreement.

Thank you for your interest in my apartment, and I look forward to welcoming you as my tenant. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
